name: Flat Rock
overview:
Flat Rock is a software and web development company. Our outsourcing solutions are bespoke and offering our clients the opportunity to scale their technical resources and to address spike load of work immediately. The model and the services introduce a risk free solution.

We offer a unique client experience and approach whereby flexible working arrangements are available to our clients. By using our Software and Web development solutions and services you can expand your team with dedicated resources in an affordable pricing. Flat Rock is keen to ensure that our engineers adhere to current technologies and standards and we constantly provide them with training and monitoring.

As our client you will benefit from highly educated and trained professionals and we support most current web and software technologies and databases including:

Open Source technologies and solutions: PHP, MySQL, Ruby on Rails, WordPress, Magento (shopping cart), CS-Cart (shopping cart), Joomla, Symfony, interspire (shopping cart) and much more.

Microsoft Technologies and solutions: ASP.NET, MS SQL, Vevo cart (shopping cart), Umbarco and more.

Other popular technologies and solutions includes mainly: C#, JAVA, AJAX, jQuery, mobile applications, Oracle database, Flash, Sliverlight and more. We would welcome your enquiry and request for quote, which requires no commitment and is free, and we will â€œtailorâ€ the solution for your needs. Contact us today and find out more about our Outsourcing services, solutions and pricing and we are certain that you will not be disappointed!
